content: lion brand pattern # 60247a skill level easy level 2 chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* a 200 yards b 100 yards crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm crochet hook - size i-9 split ring stitch markers 2 round purse handles 5-3/4 in \ 15 cm diameter handbag is worked in rounds using two colors together creates the tweed effect contrast color is used along the top edge and to cover handles some construction required to finish *free registration at site required to access patterns *
